analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/47/0x23c0d030a69092d677752d646c14ee70907b5dd3.sol:
	Contract Nyakundicoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/47/0x23c0d030a69092d677752d646c14ee70907b5dd3.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/47/0x23c0d030a69092d677752d646c14ee70907b5dd3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/47/0x23c0d030a69092d677752d646c14ee70907b5dd3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/47/0x23c0d030a69092d677752d646c14ee70907b5dd3.sol#91) is not in mixedCase
